name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
role_name: Global Product Engineer - MXDR for Microsoft Sentinel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Global Product Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in Microsoft technologies and cloud solutions. Proficient in **Microsoft 365**, **Microsoft Defender for 365**, **Microsoft Defender for Endpoint**, **Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps**, **Microsoft Defender for Identity**, and **Entra ID Identity**. Experienced in **Azure** cloud services including **Azure Architecture**, **Azure Governance**, **Azure Automation**, and **Azure Log Analytics**. Demonstrated expertise in Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) practices, leveraging **Jira** and **Confluence** within the **Atlassian ecosystem** for effective project management.

Skilled Full Stack Developer with extensive hands-on experience using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for application development. Strong background in microservices and event-driven architectures, employing frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Notable experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms, enhancing predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Committed to compliance-driven development, ensuring adherence to HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
